医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
研究人员使用水风信子开发可生物降解的卫生垫在休闲对话中，研究员Pooja Singh和她的两个同事正在讨论开发可生物降解的卫生垫的想法，并开始考虑要使用哪种原料。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/researcher-develops-biodegradable-sinational-sination-pads-using-red-using-water-hyacinth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/researcher-develops-biodegradable-sination-sinational-pads-usis-using-water-hyacinth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84726838-77E7-4B94-A613-3B85153B8FFB Fri, 11 Apr 2025 09:00:09 -0400 Researcher develops biodegradable sanitary pads using water hyacinth
研究突出显示儿童虐待与父母同理心之间的联系儿童虐待（CM）是一个复杂的问题，经常经过几代人。研究表明，被虐待的父母可能会使虐待孩子的类似模式永久化，从而造成恶性虐待循环。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/study-highlights-link-between-childhood-maltreatment-maltreatment-and-malteratment-and-arteraltal-agnpathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/study-highlights-link-between-childhood-maltreatment-maltreatment-and-arteratment-and-parental-altaltal-anpathy-aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1DEA0D48-1D96-4E05-9457-79E163051AD6 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 07:29:34 -0400 Study highlights link between childhood maltreatment and parental empathy
脑部受伤和PTSD的警察面临更高的风险与普通人群相比，警察脑部受伤的可能性是两倍以上。在值班时遭受这些伤害的军官面临着发展复杂的创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）的风险的两倍以上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/police-findicers-ant-higher-righer-risk-of--traumatic-brain-brain-injuries-injuries-and-ptsd.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/police-clice-com--------------------------------traumatic-brain-injuries-injuries-and-ptsd.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81253fa0-a5fe-4DB5-4DB5-862F-8E2D6A2E3D8D Fri, 11 Apr 2025 07:16:50 -0400 Police officers at higher risk of traumatic brain injuries and PTSD
谁领导全球在世界卫生日的孕产妇和新生儿健康行动在2025年世界卫生日之际，专门针对更健康的起点，充满希望的期货，世界卫生组织（WHO）的100多个全球办事处的主题，与成员国，社区，卫生工作者，合作伙伴和捐助者和捐助者机构和民间社会组织组织了广泛的公共倡导行动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/who-leads-global-actory-action-on-maternal-and-maternal-and-newborn-health-health-health-for--------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/who-leads-global-action-action-on-mertalnal-and-maternal-and-newborn-helth-health-health-for--------------------- and-newborn-health-for-world-health-day.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=daf8baea-008f-47c2-8617-d5ad9d18413e Fri, 11 Apr 2025 06:47:36 -0400 WHO leads global action on maternal and newborn health for World Health Day
谁警告因削减ODA而导致的卫生服务中断世界卫生组织（WHO）向卫生服务中断发出警告，报告了70％的被调查国家办公室，这是由于突然停学和官方发展援助（ODA）的卫生措施而导致的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/who-warns-of-health-service-disruptions-due-to-oda-cuts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/who-warns-of-health-service-disruptions-due-to-oda-cuts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65BC52E9-D758-4B2A-806C-764132C0B5F9 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 06:41:27 -0400 WHO warns of health service disruptions due to ODA cuts
特朗普HHS消除了与8000万人福利相关的贫困水平的办公室前员工说，唐纳德·特朗普（Donald Trump）在卫生和公共服务部的解雇包括整个设定联邦贫困准则的办公室，这些办公室确定数以万计的美国人是否有资格参加医疗补助，粮食援助，托儿服务和其他服务等健康计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/trump-hhs-eliminates-office-that-sets-poverty-poverty-levels-povels-povers-to-to-to-benefits-for-8000亿people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/trump-hhs-eliminates-office-that-sets-poverty-poverty-levels-pover-levels-to-to-benefits-to-benefits-for-8000亿people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cae57349-8147-43c0-864c-3aa68d2fdb3d Fri, 11 Apr 2025 06:36:22 -0400 Trump HHS eliminates office that sets poverty levels tied to benefits for 80 million people
孩子们需要更多的心理医院病床，但邻居说不在这里一月份，圣路易斯郊区的一名少年告诉他的高中辅导员，同学说他计划当天晚些时候自杀。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/more-psych hospital-beds-are-are-need-for-kids-kids-but-neighbors-not-not-here.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/more-psych hospital-beds-are-are-need-for-kids-kids-kids-but-neighbors-say-not-here.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75C1148C-09C7-4B73-A007-A007-6056E2EDD700 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 06:34:45 -0400 More psych hospital beds are needed for kids, but neighbors say not here
GLP-1激动剂可以重塑肠道微生物组研究表明，GLP-1受体激动剂会影响肠道微生物组，增强代谢健康并为糖尿病管理提供抗炎益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/glp-1-agonists-may-reshape-the-gut-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/glp-1-agonists-may-reshape-the-gut-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9A6A4797-B066-42B6-9D59-D0E36FDB43D8 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 05:14:00 -0400 GLP-1 agonists may reshape the gut microbiome
创新的血液测试技术可能拼写为恐惧症的结束总部位于英国的血液测试公司Thriva已与医疗器械制造商Tasso联手使用其创新的血液测试技术来解决针刺恐惧症，这种情况至少影响十分之一的成年人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/innovative-blood-testing-testing-tech-could-spell-pell-the--------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/innovative-blood-testing-tech-tech-could-spell-the-the-------------------------phobia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AE99E706-F7ED-47CE-8735-C80592EE5FBA Fri, 11 Apr 2025 04:57:00 -0400 Innovative blood testing tech could spell the end of needle phobia
Chatgpt改善了神经厌恶孩子的运动密歇根大学研究小组已使用AI来帮助自闭症儿童提供“小吃”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/chatgpt-improves-eccise-for-neurodivergent-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/chatgpt-improves-eccise-for-neurodivergent-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21BA049A-3057-4A35-B8AE-84E4E4697FA60B Fri, 11 Apr 2025 00:28:16 -0400 ChatGPT improves exercise for neurodivergent kids
